review: Very nice and pleasant experience. Was very good.  She was very welcoming and easy to talk to. Recommended

Ma'am was very patient in hearing out my concerns in relation to my blood reports and equally so in suggesting appropriate medications. Her conduct is very welcoming and friendly. I am fully satisfied with the consultation. I appreciate her charging a very nominal consultation fee, a small amount for her expertise and years of experience.  Would 10/10 recommend!

First of all it doesn’t look like a clinic at all. It is a 5x5 room that has a chair and a desk. Nothing else is there. 
She wasn’t looking like a doctor. She was not wearing mask.
She was sitting on the chair and placing her legs on the desk. She was sitting like that during the conversation too. 
I gave her my lab test report and requested to explain that report to me and if I need any medication. However, she didn’t tell me anything about my report instead she tried tried to sell some vitamins to me.

That was a horrible experience for me. I will never recommend this doctor to anyone.

The location was incorrect.
After reaching the location mentioned on Google, I walked till the other location mentioned on practo and found that to be incorrect too.

After multiple calls with the doctor was able to find the place, a hidden away residential apartment out of which she was operating, without any other staff present.

Not sure if this is even permitted.

The medication given was not satisfactory.

Visited Dr Pramila for the first time today via Practo since I'm new in Delhi and I can say it's the best decision I've made . A through professional with years and years of medical  experience but most importantly a truly warm person . She is available to answer your queries no matter what . Put me at ease instantly , didn't even feel like I'm meeting her for the first time . I highly recommend Dr Pramila

My patient was not checked. She has problem in throat & food pipeline and Doctor didn't even examine/see her tongue and/or inner throat condition.

It was like I m taking medicines from a chemist.

Highly disappointed

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Avoid this doctor at all cost. Doctor visited us in her living room. She didn't use medical apparatus and equipment to check the patient.

review: First of all the Dr. Pramila doesn't even have a clinic. She sees patients in her living room. There is no apparatus. She didn't even check fever. Suggested paracetamol and vitamins ******* ****** ************  *** ***** *** ****** Atleast it should be mentioned in the app that it's not a clinic.
I visited the doctor for high fever, throat pain and runny nose. She listened to my problens patiently and explained the underlying issue in detail. She is a very friendly and helpful doctor.
*** ********** ** ** ********* ******* She patiently heard my issue and made me so much comfortable that I don't think I would go to any other general physician apart from her. Highly recommend her.

Sweet doctor, helpful and friendly. Quite approachable and understanding. Highly reccomend. Affordable.
Doctor is too gentle in talking and explaining everything if asked. Prescribed Medicine are not too expensive *** **********
I definitely recommend the doctor, well experienced. Explained all my queries related to my health issues in a really nice way.

Very experienced and friendly doctor. Easy to talk to *** ************** 
I visited her for a wound infection and she put me at ease immediately.
I visited today for my mom health issues , she really made us comfortable & she’s very friendly, humble & pleasant. My best wishes and regards.
Doctor was very warm and understood my mom’s health issues well. In spite of ailing from a bone fracture, she took the time out to meet us and guided us.

*** ****** ** ************* *** friendly. Fee charged by her is reasonable. She didn't prescribe costly medicines either. Overall, it was a nice experience.  Chicken pox could be treated within 5 days

Dr Pramila is unlike the doctors you see today. Who are always in a hurry. She spends time knowing you and your ailment. She has many years of experience which is invaluable for patients who need solid advice.

The doctor was very helpful and polite.She explained every so well.
I would really recommend the doctor.

review: This is not a clinic. It is her home where she opens the door and asks you to sit on the sofa in her drawing room. *** ***** *** *** ******** ******** ********* ** ******* I went to her because of regular fever. She did not even check my temperature. *** **** ****** **** **** ******* ********** The whole process did not even take 2 minutes. After payment when I asked for a receipt, she wrote - "paid Rs 500" on the prescription.
